alert.note: Alert for Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 6:30PM EDT until April 28 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Guilford County in central North Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 630 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kernersville, or 8 miles northwest of Greensboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greensboro, High Point, McLeansville, Summerfield, Gibsonville, Stokesdale, Haw River State Park, Lake Guilford Mackintosh Marina, Lake Jeanette Marina and Monticello. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
